name: luxe-myers-drip

introHead: REVITALIZE YOUR BODY WITH THE LUXE MYERS COCKTAIL
introDesc: Elevate your wellness with our nutrient-rich IV infusion.
ctaBenefits: ESSENTIAL VITAMINS & MINERALS | BOOST ENERGY & IMMUNITY | ENHANCE OVERALL WELLBEING

seoTitle: Luxe Myers Drip | Luxe Mobile IV

helmet.title: Luxe Myers Drip | Luxe Mobile IV
helmet.description: Revitalize your body and mind with our powerful Myers Cocktail IV infusion. Packed with essential vitamins and minerals, this treatment will boost your energy, strengthen your immunity, and enhance your overall wellness.

seoDescription: Elevate your wellness with the Luxe Myers Drip. Our advanced IV infusion delivers a potent blend of vitamins and minerals to revitalize your body and mind. Book your appointment now and experience the transformative benefits of the Myers Cocktail.

ingredients.name: Vitamin C
ingredients.description: Boosts immune system and promotes collagen production.

ingredients.name: B-Complex Vitamins
ingredients.description: Supports energy metabolism and nervous system function.

ingredients.name: Vitamin B12
ingredients.description: Aids in red blood cell formation and neurological function.

ingredients.name: Magnesium
ingredients.description: Supports muscle and nerve function, and helps regulate heart rhythm.

ingredients.name: Calcium
ingredients.description: Essential for strong bones and proper muscle function.

ingredients.name: Zinc
ingredients.description: Supports immune system and promotes wound healing.

name: luxe-migraine-drip

introHead: FAST RELIEF FOR MIGRAINES AND PMS SYMPTOMS
introDesc: Find effective, immediate relief with our specially formulated migraine IV drip.
ctaBenefits: HYDRATION & ELECTROLYTES | PAIN RELIEF | NAUSEA REDUCTION
benefitsSubtext: Get back to feeling your best with our targeted migraine treatment.
seoTitle: Luxe Migraine Drip | Luxe Mobile IV

helmet.title: Luxe Migraine Drip | Luxe Mobile IV
helmet.description: Experience fast relief from migraines and PMS symptoms with our specially formulated IV drip. Packed with hydration, electrolytes, and pain-relieving ingredients, this treatment will help you get back to feeling your best.

seoDescription: Find effective, immediate relief from migraines and PMS symptoms with the Luxe Migraine Drip. Our advanced IV infusion delivers targeted hydration and pain-relieving ingredients to help you feel better fast. Book your appointment now and get back to your day.

ingredients.name: Saline Solution
ingredients.description: Provides full hydration and helps restore electrolyte balance.

ingredients.name: Magnesium
ingredients.description: Helps relax blood vessels and reduce migraine pain.

ingredients.name: Toradol
ingredients.description: Non-steroidal anti-inflammatory drug (NSAID) for pain relief.

ingredients.name: Zofran
ingredients.description: Anti-nausea medication to alleviate migraine-related nausea and vomiting.

ingredients.name: B-Complex Vitamins
ingredients.description: Supports energy metabolism and nervous system function.
